item.title: Everything We Know About David Fincher’s ‘The Adventures of Cliff Booth’
item.description: With production starting on Netflix’s “The Adventures of Cliff Booth,” fans are eagerly speculating at what to expect from the David Fincher-directed sequel to Quentin Tarantino&#821
